mapper.insert: insert into sscustomer (cu_id, customer_name, customer_psd, customer_sex, birthday, tel, address, comment) values (#{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sscustomer set customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_psd = #{customerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_sex = #{customerSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cu_id = #{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cu_id, customer_name, customer_psd, customer_sex, birthday, tel, address, comment from sscustomer where cu_id = #{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select cu_id, customer_name, customer_psd, customer_sex, birthday, tel, address, comment from sscustomer
